news.title: Tesla Stock Surges Post-Trump Win: Consider Buying for 2025?
news.content: Musk-Trump ties and autonomous driving growth, along with Elon Musk's confidence, increase Tesla stock's appeal for next year.

news.title: Why Tesla Stock Is on the Heels of a Record High Today
news.content: Tesla ( NASDAQ: TSLA ) stock has been marching sharply higher since the U.S. presidential election last month, even with mixed expectations on how the incoming Trump administration will view electric vehicle ( EV ) companies.But CEO Elon Musk's strong public support of Donald Trump has investors ...

news.title: Tesla Unusual Options Activity For December 10 - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Deep-pocketed investors have adopted a bearish approach towards Tesla TSLA, and it's something market players shouldn't ignore. Our tracking of public options records at Benzinga unveiled this significant move today.
